means: 临死所卧的床，临终之时

sentence.Network_en: He promised his mother on her deathbed that he would never marry.
sentence.Network_cn: 他向垂危的母亲保证他绝不结婚。

sentence.Network_en: Even though at their last gasp, the enemies will still put up their deathbed struggle.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使是奄奄一息, 敌人也还是要作垂死挣扎的.

sentence.Network_en: He forgave her on his deathbed , ie as he lay dying.

图文诗歌呈现了传统的冥想主题——临终之时(deathbed)。此诗的创作,邓恩也使用了传统天主教的末世观的标准化,即万民四末(The Four Last Things):“死亡”“审判”.

list.abs: UF异形词　缓和医疗　palliative care临终关怀　deathbed caringBT广义词　医疗　1817 MEDICAL TREATMENT
...thbed communication，简称为DBC）现象。因为在视觉所见之外，一部份的交流是听觉性的，还有一些是触觉性的交流之故，因此比起「临终视见」（deathbed visions），劳雷两氏较偏好使用「临终交流」一词。据那研究中所提及的护士，89%被回报经验DBC的病人有著安宁且平静的死亡；而只有40.5%被回报没有经.

The deathbed scene is the climax of the play ., 临死之前的场景是整出戏的高潮.

entry.def: If someone is on their deathbed, they are in a bed and about to die.

example.ex: He promised his mother on her deathbed that he would never marry.
example.tran: 他向垂危的母亲保证他绝不结婚。

example.ex: ...after the man who murdered him nearly 40 years ago made a deathbed confession.
example.tran: 在那个近40 年前谋杀了他的男子临终供认了罪行之后

means.word_mean: 1. the last few hours before death
2. the bed on which a person dies

auth_sentence.content: Picture me lying flat out on my deathbed.
